Torrent is just fine .I finished game.Just move iso files over Daemon Tools virtual drive.First first file then it will ask you do you want to install,click install after aboute 2-4 minutes in the install progress it will ask you to put second iso file and after 2-4 min. third.

Torrent is just fine i finished game.It is so simple people.Drag and drop iso file in the Daemon tool virtual drive.First first iso file,then will show you install window,click.After 2-4 min. it will ask you second iso file and then after 2-4 min third.

Here's the SHA256 hashes of the three disk images: 

ME3.N7.DD.Edition-SiMON-DVD1.iso: e27580b262a4d7e33c7ca3e9e63229219c0f218ddf46269cf9b9fed675408228
ME3.N7.DD.Edition-SiMON-DVD2.iso: 8483e88f0fc50c4a3f635baaa68d7f427b6380a7ea6ce999f3d04c0e50df6b91
ME3.N7.DD.Edition-SiMON-DVD3.iso: 15d51caa0d7c4bce633994ab62c0d347c89c998863cdea3b995d6a9f02947940

Single-player game installs, runs, and plays perfectly on Windows 7 64-bit in English. I did not try multiplayer.

Mounted the images using Virtual CloneDrive with no problems.

Hey so for wvwryone having trouble with this ill walk you through it k? So first when you finish downloading the torrent and open it in your downloads folder go to disc 2 and 3 and exctract all the content to the desktop, once thats done make two folders on the desktop and lable them mass effect 3 disc 2 and mass effect disc 3 and put the disc 2 content in the disc 2 folder you have created and do the same for disc three. now go to disn in youre downlods folder and double click autorun.exe it will than pop up with a screen with the mass effect 3 pic and two buttons: install and exit. click install and eventually it will ask you for disc 2, click browse go to desktop and click on the disc two folder you screated earlier and click ok, after a few mins it will come up with a simillar message asking for disc 3 this time do the same thing but with youre disc three folder. now wait for the installation to finish. Congradulations you now have mass effect 3:D! message me if you need help.
sorry typo where it says disn i meant go to disc 1 in youre downloads folder.

Minimum system requirements

* OS – Windows XP SP3/Vista SP1, Win 7
* CPU – 1.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo (equivalent AMD CPU)
* RAM – 1GB for XP / 2GB RAM for Vista/Win 7
* Disc Drive – 1x speed
* Hard Drive – 15 GB of free space
* Video – 256 MB* (with Pixel Shader 3.0 support)
* Sound – DirectX 9.0c compatible
* DirectX – DirectX 9.0c August 2009 (included)
